write a letter to the local council. in your letter 
describe how the ruubish collection system is not working properly
explain how this is affecting you and your neighbours
suugest what should be done about the problem
text: I am writing this letter to complain about the waste collection service of our area which does not work appropriately because they do not come at the scheduled time and days that arranged to come and when they come we do not become aware and this resulting in remaining garbage bags in different parts of our neighbourhood which causes to create the nasty smell and disgusting view.

Hence, it has been embarrassing for all neighbours especially when we are host and has guests. In addition, it contributes to spreading disease and collecting mosquitoes. If I were a council member, I would solve this vital issue as soon as possible since the previous service used to be fully regular.

I suggest employing someone who has more sense of commitment and responsibility although they may have some problems such as getting low salaries which should be solved as a result we recommend asking municipality employees if they have had any difficulties.
